titleStmt.title: Description of Rare Book & Manuscript Library Ms. Codex 1710: Gojiryaku.

availability.licence: These images and the content of University of Pennsylvania, Ms. Codex 1710: Gojiryaku. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. See the Creative Commons Public Domain Mark page for usage details, http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/.

notesStmt.note: Title from cover. No title piece (daisen) present. Added romanized caption title, Go Ji Ryaku (note in pencil, Volume 1, f. 1r).

msContents.summary: Manuscript, in an unidentified hand, originally in two volumes but now bound together in a single volume. A note in pencil on the first page describes the content as "Brief notices of foreign countries and their products" (Volume 1, f. 1r).

supportDesc.extent: 2 volumes (36, 42 double leaves) in 1 : 275 x 185 (220 x 150) mm bound to 285 x 205 mm

collation.p: Paper, i (20th-century) + original upper cover + i + 36 double leaves + original lower cover + original upper cover + 42 double leaves + original lower cover + i (20th century).

history.provenance: Gift of Divie Bethune McCartee (McCartee Library bookplates on front flyleaf (Volume 1) and front pastedown (Volume 2)) in the 1880s, accessioned in 1900.
